scheduled_maintenances.name: [BHS5][Network] - Network equipement maintenance on multiple racks

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Network offer. This may temporarily affect Availability. Start time : 08/04/2025 07:30 UTC End time : 08/04/2025 09:30 UTC Service impact : Loss of vRack on the following racks T05F24, T05G23, T05G22, T05F39, T05G08, T05F38, T05F37, T05F36, T05F35, T05F34, T05F33, T05F33, T06A02, T05F31, T05F30, T05F28, T05F27, T05F26, T05G05, T05F21 and T05F16 during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a Vrack network equipment. Thank you for your understanding

Start time : 09/04/2025 11:00 UTC End time : 09/04/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance. The operation is carried out in several steps: Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 20:30 UTC Step 3 : From 20:30 UTC to 21:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709 Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Load Balancer offer. Start time : 02/04/2025 10:00 UTC End time : 07/04/2025 10:05 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Load Balancer offer: support of HTTP2 traffic. The support of the HTTP2 traffic will be available for all our offers and activated on demand, meaning that the change will be applied when the load balancers will be refreshed by the customer. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation as we work to improve our platform and provide you with the best possible service.
